description: Ripe bananas and toasty pecans make delicious toppings for this dairy-free, wholemeal French toast.
name: Wholemeal Coconut French Toast with Bananas & Pecans Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat the eggs in a large, shallow dish with the coconut milk and vanilla. Heat a medium non stick pan on medium high heat and drizzle with enough oil to coat.
Dip 2 slices of bread in the egg mix, turn to coat each side and fry for 1-2 minutes on each side, until golden brown. Repeat with the remaining bread and egg mix.
Sprinkle the banana slices with cinnamon and add to the pan. Cook for 1 minute on each side to caramelise slightly.
Serve the French toast with caramelised bananas and pecans on top.
